ComicInfo.Penciller: Ernie Chan,Fred Carrillo,Howard Chaykin,Buddy Gernale,Ric Estrada
ComicInfo.Title: Back from the Dead; The Warrior Breed; The Soldier from Space
ComicInfo.Summary: A man stumbles upon a miracle -- a plate-glass window still stands. After contemplating all that must have happened in front of this window, he shatters it with a brick.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
